dimension: 21 3/4 x 3 x 1 1/2 in. (55.25 x 7.62 x 3.81 cm) (including tassels, without hanging cord)
title: Portable Shrine
description: silver compartmentalized container on blue yarn cord with two large tassels at bottom; box decorated with three rectangular cartouches on each side with dragons, birds and flowers; six round silver beads, one square bead and bird-shaped bead at top
